We Need Your Help!

We are working diligently to get this service off the ground! We are climbers who need shoes re-soled and are creating this company as part of the Lexington Startup Weekend event. We need market research, community support, and are looking for local talent. Please fill out the survey and let us know that you would utilize this service! Also, subscribe to our mailing list and we will let you know when we are fully functioning!
